page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content: Most activities take place in the village hall. Nearly every day badminton. Every week the Mother and Baby Club and the Over 60's Club meet at the hall. It is also used by Ist Keston Guides, Brownies and Keston Scouts for bazaars sometimes. Keston Morris Men also use the hall. Downstair Morris Men also use the hall. Downstairs there is a Men's Club. WOMEN'S INSTITUTE, KESTON There is an active W.I., President Mrs J.Short, Secretary Mrs D. Warburton which monthly in the Village Hall. It is concerned with local issues e.g. the development of the green belt, road safety and national matters such as pollution and drug abuse. It has an active craft section which is knitting suares for Ethiopia and making kneelers for the Church. Leisure activities include Keep Fit, rambling and darts.
